objects.description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) has used BitLocker and DiskCryptor to encrypt targeted workstations. (Citation: DFIR Phosphorus November 2021)(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)
